#PROCESS:
#3 Methods
#   Location (Based off ZIP)
#      Picking store (Store Rating, Hours, Address)
#   Give choices for Product (In Catergories) [???]
#      List: Avaliblity (quantity), Price, Warrenty, Pre-owned, Description
#           (Add additional method for addtional information)
#   Conclusion (List of prodcuts choosen, Store hours & Address)
#BB_url_products= 'https://api.bestbuy.com/v1/products'
BB_url_stores = 'https://api.bestbuy.com/v1/stores'
#BB_url_catergory = 'https://api.bestbuy.com/v1/categories'

!pip install -q requests
!pip install chart-studio
import urllib, base64
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')
import requests
import json

option = {'apiKey': 'PO1GPj1c2yOdKQLEdYMfG6P9', 'format' : 'json' }
#response_prod = requests.get(BB_url_products, params = option)


response_store = requests.get(BB_url_stores, params = option)
print(response_store.url)

#response_cat = requests.get(BB_url_catergory)
#print(response_cat.url)

#print(response_prod.ok)
#print(response_store.status_code)
print(response_store.ok)
#print(response_cat.status_code)
#print(response_cat.ok)
#print(type(response_prod))
print(type(response_store))
#print(type(response_cat))

#info = response_prod.json()
store_info = response_store.json()
#info = response_cat.json()
#info['products']
#info['store']
#info['category']

source:
#save page numbers (1,10) in a varible
#for loop
#New var (DF) for total pages
    #append each page to this varible
beg_page_store = store_info_df['from'][0]+1
end_page_store = store_info_df['to'][0]+1

store_page_ls = []
store_page_df = pd.DataFrame()

sort_attr = ''
#print(beg_page_store)
#print(end_page_store)
option = {'apiKey': 'PO1GPj1c2yOdKQLEdYMfG6P9', 'format' : 'json', 'pageSize':10, 'page': 1,'sort' : sort_attr }

#"/v1/products(type=\"Movie\")?show=sku,name,salePrice&format=json&pageSize=3&page=10&apiKey=YourAPIKey"

for i in range(beg_page_store,end_page_store):
    response_store = requests.get(BB_url_stores, params = option)
    store_page_ls.append(response_store.json())
    
    option['page']=i
    print(i)
    
#store_page_ls
store_info_df = pd.DataFrame(store_page_ls)
store_info_df
